title: Protect your valuables with this compact - and affordable - fireproof safe
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle Canada is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

Though you may not want to think about the worst case scenarios, it’s always a smart idea to be prepared for anything.

Amazon knows that it’s better to be safe than sorry, which is why they carry a huge selection of items that take your personal security seriously. Take for example the SereneLife Fireproof Lock Box, the best-selling lock box that’s ideal for storing your valuables at home or away.

Made using reinforced solid steel wall construction, the SereneLife Fireproof Lock Box features a dual security steel door that uses locking bolts as well a battery-operated pinpad. If you’re worried about forgetting the combination, it also comes with two keys for manual access.

Image via Amazon. More

Shoppers have been loving its sturdy design and durable finish that’s ideal for protecting small items, with several reviewers taking to the comments to share this “great safe option.”

“It is easy to use with two keys and a keypad option,” one shared. “Batteries come right with it so it is ready to go right out of the box for securing your items. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a smaller size safe at a great price.”

A corrosion and stain-resistant powder coat finish keeps the drop box safe, while a fireproof coating protects your valuables in the event of a fire.

Image via Amazon. More

Measuring just 12.2” by 7.8”, this safe is small enough to be hidden away inside a drawer or closet, and even comes with pre-drilled holes for mounting it to the wall or floor.

“Safe works great, and was the perfect size for my needs,” wrote one five-star reviewer. “It was hard to find one this size, so I'm glad I was able to without spending a fortune on it.”

Regularly priced at $65, the SereneLife Fireproof Lock Box is currently on sale for just $58, meaning you can keep your money where you want it - in your wallet (or your safe!).

Image via Amazon. More

SHOP IT: Amazon, $58 (originally $65)

The reviews quoted above reflect the most recent versions at the time of publication.
